text: SELECT R.id, S.cdate The DBMS represents a clause FROM R JOIN S as an expression tree. ON R.id = S.id ; WHERE S.value > 100 The nodes in the tree represent different expression types: AND — Comparisons (=, <, >, ! =) — Conjunction (AND), Disjunction (OR) — Arithmetic Operators (+, =, *, /, %) = > — Constant Values — Tuple Attribute References Attribute(R.id)| | Attribute(S.id) Attribute(v = == CMU-DB 3 4 - æ - ____——______—_+_ A ; & IM D DI <% 5515/1:0537 - EXPRESSION EVALUATION > - 80 $ I i 12 - Query Execution | (CMU Databases Systems / Fall 2019)
